Text:
Great work here. o play these i just have to load them from the console?

Regards

@jamesensor: just copy and paste the downloaded vpks from this torrent into the \Steam\steamapps\common\left 4 dead 2\left4dead2\addons directory. You need L4D2-Addon-Support installed as well (Steam->Library->Tools-> L4D2 Addon Support). After doing that, you're done! You should now be able to join or create a game with these maps with other people!
to load them. Just double click the vpk file from inside your favorite zip app. They will automatically install.
